report.title: Pollenators My Collections List
report.description: Form Internal Report: Used to retrieve details of collections associated with a survey and user.
report.query: SELECT s.id, s.location_name, s.location_id, sav2.int_value as completed FROM samples s INNER JOIN sample_attribute_values sav1 ON sav1.sample_id = s.id AND sav1.sample_attribute_id = #userID_attr_id# AND sav1.int_value = #userID# INNER JOIN sample_attribute_values sav2 ON sav2.sample_id = s.id AND sav2.sample_attribute_id = #complete_attr_id# WHERE s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id IS NULL #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for?
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: userID_attr_id
param.description: Sample Attribute ID used to Identify User

param.name: userID
param.description: CMS User ID: use -1 for non logged in people

param.name: complete_attr_id
param.description: Sample Attribute ID used to indicate when collection is complete
